item.title: Projects
item.description: 🎮Personal Projects DDMre Reimplementation of Yu-Gi-Oh! Dungeon Dice Monsters video game. Implementation: Godot, GDScript Status: Under development Link: 🔗 FRANK6000 Simple, multi-cycle, 8-bits processor designed in Verilog. Implementation: Verilog Status: Finished Link: 🔗 El Caso Sustituto Spanish translation of the fanmade game Turnabout Substitution. Status: Finished Link: 🔗 💼Work Projects Calan Digital

item.title: CV
item.description: 🙋Description I’m an electrical engineer ⚡ from Chile 🇨🇱. I have worked mostly in radio astronomy. I have experience in FPGA programming, RF engineering, digital signal processing, and machine learning. I love programming 🧑‍💻. My favorite programming language is Python 🐍. I try to use Linux 🐧 and open source software 🐂 wherever I can. I’m currently working as a manager for the Millimeter-Wave Laboratory, from University of Chile.
